This review is for the zichar stall which I will not recommend.

Tried the fried rice and lala beehoon and both were very substandard. Fried rice only had egg as ingredient and the chicken was tough. The lala beehoon seems to be over cooked and the taste was really not great.

Very disappointed.
Bad review for the zichar stall. Very rude front desk staff. Bad first impression having dinner here.
